Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete admin panel for Services, Blog, Testimonials, and Team management

Implemented full CRUD functionality for all remaining admin sections:

Services Management:
- API routes with full CRUD operations \(GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE\)
- Admin pages for list, add, and edit services
- Support for features array and display ordering
- 7 pre-loaded services \(Overview, Consultation, Program Finding, Documentation, OET, IELTS, TOEFL\)

Blog Management:
- Enhanced blog API with POST endpoint for creating posts
- Dynamic route for individual blog operations \(GET, PATCH, DELETE\)
- Admin pages with search and category filtering
- Rich content editor support with draft/publish status
- Statistics dashboard \(total posts, published, comments\)
- 6 sample blog posts with 8 category options

Testimonials Management:
- Complete API routes for testimonial CRUD operations
- Admin interface with featured flag support
- Background style options \(white/gray\)
- Search functionality across name, role, and text

Team Management:
- API routes for team member management
- Admin pages with contact information fields \(email, phone\)
- Display ordering and profile image support
- 4 pre-loaded team members

All sections follow consistent admin UI patterns with:
- Responsive table layouts
- Search and filter capabilities
- Status badges and visual indicators
- Form validation and error handling
- Success notifications
- Mobile-friendly design

Data is stored in-memory for easy development and testing, ready for future database migration.

EOF
